text: Allah Taalaa ki rehmat kay baees aap inn per naram dil hain aur agar aap bad zaban aur sakht dil hotay to yeh sab aap kay pass say chatt jatay so aap inn say dar guzar keren aur inn kay liye istaghfaar keren aur kaam ka mashwara inn say kiya keren phir jab aap ka pukhta irada hojaye to Allah Taalaa per bharosa keren be-shak Allah Taalaa tawakkal kerney walon say mohabbat kerta hai
